name: The Spirit of Chryptmass
description:
Just in time for the end of the holiday season, a MÖRK BORG addition that provides your players with an event that celebrates what matters most in the Dying Land: betrayal, theft, and the End. 

This addition includes new holiday lore, a series of repulsive traditions to try out, some terrifying enemies to pin your players against, and some truly monstrous hooks to integrate all this new material into your campaign.

From a  deadly sled ride, to a thief in the night, to vengeful spectres, to bloody snow, to mystery meat dishes, to haunted toys, to cursed decorations, the fun never ends. 

A Gloomy Chyrptmass to all, and to all an awful Final Year!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This event was created for submission to the following jam:

Antichrist-mass
